answers.answer: Congratulations!! I am so happy for you. I had my son too early last year and he didnt survive but i am now 23 weeks and feeling so blessed! I cant wait to meet my little bundle of joy.

Thanks guys! I had my son in 2013 he was 24 weeks and only weighed 11.2 oz so he was too tiny to survive  I had preeclampsia but so far this pregnancy I don't have anything. So I'm feeling like maybe this is the one(:
My son was 22 weeks when i had him early. For this pregnancy they have me taking progesterone shots once a week. Are they doing anything like that for you?
I took the suppository ones until week 11 then they had me stop. I think that is what help us a lot because before they did nothing like that and I miscarried.
Thats great to hear!! I wonder why they choose to do suppositories for some and weekly shots for others! Im glad all is going well for you!
Congratulations I've had 2 losses and I'm 30 weeks with my rainbow  baby I love my prince so much already
Aw congratulations! I had a miscarriage last July and now I'm 29 weeks pregnant with my rainbow baby! And I'm having a girl too!
It feels so great being able to have a rainbow baby after loses I can't wait to hold mine! Congrats ladies!

question: So excited I finally made it into the second trimester abs everything's looking positive after a stillbirth and two miscarriages I'm finally getting to get my rainbow it looks like and SHES A GIRL!!!I'm feel so blessed and beyond excited
title: My rainbow!
